name: SteXam
description:
Captain Blimpington's lovely Lady Blimpula has been kidnapped by the dastardly Professor Cogsworth!!

Armed only with his trusty Steam Laser, he charges into the lengthy, linear labyrinth beneath the vile villain's castle.

Control your blimp with WASD and aim with the mouse. Your laser takes time to build up a head of steam, so check your pressure gauge in the top-left corner. The higher the pressure, the more damage your attack will do, but once you start firing, there's no way to stop until the pressure has been released.

Cogsworth and her hat robots are vulnerable once every ten seconds: Strike when their head glows red for massive bonus damage!

The castle's defenders will staunchly stand their ground. Search for clouds of Healing Steam to recover from the injuries they inflict upon you!

If you decide Blimpula's not worth the trouble, the escape key will abort your attempt, suddenly and without warning.

  • Created using Godot.
  • 3D assets designed using Blender
  • Textures drawn using Aseprite and Krita
  • Music made with GarageBand and Bosca Ceoil
  • Uses the "Nickelodeon NF" font by Nick Curtis
  • Sound effects generated with bfxr
